subject: Olympic Games (2012)
Badminton
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: The four badminton teams that were disqualified Wednesday simply looked at the information presented to them and went in the direction that seemed to have the best chance of leading them to their goal.
snippet: The four badminton teams that were disqualified Wednesday simply looked at the information presented to them and went in the direction that seemed to have the best chance of leading them to their goal.
